assembler
Class Literal

java.lang.Object
  assembler.Literal

public class Literal
extends java.lang.Object

The Class Literal represents a Literal and provides getters and setters for its fields.

Version:
11.12.2008
Author:
Simen Hammerseth, Magnus Lervaag, Andreas Urke
See Also:
TwoPass
